thread.title: John Oliver: Can Obama Cool It With the Vacation Photos While ‘America Is on Fire’?
thread.title_full: John Oliver: Can Obama Cool It With the Vacation Photos While ‘America Is on Fire’?

author: Josh Feldman
title: John Oliver: Can Obama Cool It With the Vacation Photos While ‘America Is on Fire’?
text:
John Oliver: Can Obama Cool It With the Vacation Photos While ‘America Is on Fire’? by Josh Feldman | 5:06   
John Oliver said last night he doesn’t particularly like seeing those vacation photos of Barack Obama enjoying himself when “America is on fire.” 
He appeared on Seth Meyers ‘ show last night and told him, “I’m a little sick of seeing photos of President Obama on vacation with Richard Branson . Just tone it down with the kite-surfing pictures.” 
Oliver observed that perhaps Obama’s never been “more out of touch than he is right now.” 
Meyers said at the very least Obama could be asking people not to post photos of him having fun. 
Watch above, via NBC.
